short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Santa is here to eat your cookies! Use this plugin to view and delete cookies placed on your browser by feeding them to Santa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If there’s one thing we all know about Santa Claus, it’s that he doesn’t shy away from a baked good, especially if it’s set by the fireplace with a cold glass of something to dip it in.

He’d never admit it, but what he loves most about the holidays are the cookies.

Imagine his delight when we told him that cookies are available all year round, right here on the internet. In fact, our web browsers are are full of them.

And so, we offered him the chance to follow anyone around and eat as many cookies as he wants.  

To feed Santa your cookies, simply download and install the Feed Santa Your Cookies Chrome extension. Visit any URL and click the extension to see a list of cookies placed on your browser by the site, and then choose one, or more, to clear by feeding to jolly old St. Nick.

In the end, your browser will be cleaner, and Santa will be full… of holiday spirit.
